trans-unit.source: A data-bound list control that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list.
trans-unit.target: En databundet listekontroll som tillater egendefinert oppsett ved å gjenta en angitt mal for hvert element vises i listen.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Data Binding](#data_binding) - [Templates](#templates) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The Repeater control is a basic templated data-bound list.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [databinding](#data_binding) - [maler](#templates) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## innføring i Repeater kontrollen er en grunnleggende organisasjonsapper databundet-liste.

trans-unit.source: It has no built-in layout or styles, so you must explicitly declare all layout, formatting, and style tags within the control's templates.
trans-unit.target: Har ingen innebygde oppsettet eller stiler, slik at du må eksplisitt deklarerer alle oppsettet formatering og stil koder i kontrollens maler.

trans-unit.source: The Repeater control allows you to split markup tags across the templates.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen Repeater kan du dele-koder over malene.

trans-unit.source:
To create a table using templates, include the begin table tag (``) in the , a single table row tag (``) in the , and the end table tag (`
`) in the .
trans-unit.target:
Hvis du vil opprette en tabell som bruker maler, kan du inkludere begin tabellen-kode (``) i den , en enkelt tabell rad-kode (``) i den , og koden end tabell (`
`) i .

trans-unit.source: The Repeater control has no built-in selection capabilities or editing support.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen Repeater har ingen innebygde utvalget funksjoner eller redigere kundestøtte.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand> event to process control events that are raised from the templates to the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand>-hendelsen for å behandle kontrollhendelsene som aktiveres med maler kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: Validering serverkontroller leveres også for å vurdere brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [validering Server kontrollen syntaks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).

trans-unit.source: ## Data Binding The Repeater control provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: ## Databinding Repeater kontrollen inneholder to egenskaper for å støtte databinding.

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or an array), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source.
trans-unit.target: Til å binde data i en samling som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet (som en <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, eller en matrise), eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnitt ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>til å angi datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>-egenskapen, må du manuelt skrive kode for å utføre databinding.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind the Repeater control to a data source represented by a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil automatisk binde Repeater kontrollen til en datakilde som er representert av en datakildekontroll, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>for datakildekontrollen skal brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, the Repeater control automatically binds to the specified data source control on the first request.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen Repeater kontrollen automatisk binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen ved første forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method unless you have changed data-related properties of the Repeater control.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke eksplisitt kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>metoden hvis du har endret data-relaterte egenskaper kontrollens Repeater.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Repeater control binds its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> to either the data model declared and referenced by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property or the data source control specified by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En Repeater kontroll binding den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>til enten dataene modellen deklarert og refererer til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>egenskapen eller dataene datakilde kontrollen som er angitt av sin <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A> are not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A>er ikke bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Repeater control's data source is set but no data is returned, the control renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A> with no items.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Repeater kontrollens datakilden er angitt, men ingen data returneres, kontrollen gjengir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>med ingen elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is `null`, the Repeater is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er `null`, Repeater ikke gjengis.

trans-unit.source: ## Templates At a minimum, every Repeater control must define an .
trans-unit.target: ## Maler minimum, må hver Repeater kontroll definere en .

trans-unit.source: However, other optional templates described in the following table can be used to customize the appearance of the list.
trans-unit.target: Andre valgfrie maler som beskrevet i følgende tabell kan imidlertid brukes til å tilpasse utseendet til listen.

trans-unit.source: |Template name|Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>|Defines the content and layout of items within the list.
trans-unit.target: | Malnavn | Beskrivelse | |-------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>| Definerer innhold og oppsett av elementene i listen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This template is required.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, determines the content and layout of alternating (zero-based odd-indexed) items.
trans-unit.target: Denne malen er påkrevd. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>| Hvis angitt, bestemmer innhold og oppsett loddrette (nullbasert ulik-indekserte) elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A> is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A>|If defined, is rendered between items (and alternating items).
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, brukes <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A>| Hvis angitt, gjengis mellom elementer (og vekslende elementer).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SeparatorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a separator is not rendered.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>|If defined, determines the content and layout of the list header.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, et skilletegn er ikke gjengis. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>| Hvis angitt, bestemmer innhold og oppsett av listen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a header is not rendered.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>|If defined, determines the content and layout of the list footer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, gjengis ikke et hode. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>| Hvis angitt, bestemmer innhold og oppsett av listen bunnteksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a footer is not rendered.| ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                           ```
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, gjengis ikke bunntekst. | ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                           ```

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objektet implementering av <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som definerer hvordan veksler elementer i kontrollen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a different appearance for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from what is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi et annet utseende for alternative elementer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen fra hva som er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when data methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når datametoder blir kalt.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne hendelsen er å gi deg muligheten til å angi at datametoder for å kalles er på et annet objekt enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains the child controls of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> som inneholder underordnede kontroller av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Controls collection to manage the child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk kontrollsamlingen til å administrere underordnede kontroller av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: It is commonly used to retrieve a child control from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Det brukes vanligvis til å hente en underordnet kontroll fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: You can also add and remove child controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også legge til og fjerne underordnede kontroller fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To access a child control within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> for a given index.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å få tilgang til en underordnet kontroll i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollere, gå gjennom den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A>samlingen for å hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem>for en angitt indeks.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: Then call the **Repeater** item's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method to retrieve a control with a particular ID.
trans-unit.target: Kaller den **Repeater** elementet er arvet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>metode for å hente en kontroll med en bestemt ID.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains the child controls of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> som inneholder underordnede kontroller av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av ASP.NET siden framework skal varsles serverkontroller bruker sammensetningen implementeringen til å opprette alle underordnede kontroller de inneholder under forberedelsene for publisering tilbake eller gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a control hierarchy, with or without the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et kontrollhierarki med eller uten den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to use the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Angir om du vil bruke den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*> value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: The first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SelectArguments%2A> property calls the CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method to return the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Det første kallet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SelectArguments%2A>egenskapen kaller CreateDataSourceSelectArguments-metoden til å returnere den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.SelectArguments%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>

trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"> </xref> objekt med angitt elementtype og plassering i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The specified location within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control to place the created item.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte plasseringen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen skal plasseres opprettet elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> that represents the specified type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> item to create.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> som representerer den angitte typen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> element for å opprette.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> object is being created.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"> </xref> objekt opprettes.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance in scenarios where you want to use a custom class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne hendelsen er å gi deg muligheten til å endre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>forekomst i tilfeller der du vil bruke en egendefinert klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control and all its child controls to the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Binding av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontroll og alle underordnede kontrolltypene til den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBind method to bind the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden Databinde ikke binde datakilde som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you bind a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, the information in the data source is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Når du binde datakilde til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen, informasjonen i datakilden som skal vises i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>metoden brukes også vanligvis til å synkronisere datakilden og en liste over kontroll etter informasjon i datakilden er oppdatert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør endringer i datakilden også oppdateres i en liste over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the data source for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, you do not need to explicitly call the DataBind method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen du trenger ikke å kalle eksplisitt metoden Databinde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET kaller denne metoden automatisk for å binde angitte kildekontrollen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific table in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*> to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den bestemte tabellen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sources of data, use the DataMember property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>egenskapen inneholder flere datakilder, bruke egenskapen DataMember til å angi bestemte datakilden skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>med flere tabeller, må du angi hvilken tabell som skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde datakilden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a table in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir en tabell i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that provides data for populating the list.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden som inneholder data for utfylling av listen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the source of data to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi datakilden til å fylle ut den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The DataSource can be any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> collection such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> for accessing databases, a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or an array, or an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> object.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan være <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen som en <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>for tilgang til databaser, en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, eller en matrise eller et <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>objektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property you must manually write the code to bind to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir egenskapen DataSource må du manuelt skrive som skal bindes til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the DataSource property contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden som er angitt av egenskapen DataSource inneholder flere datakilder, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>til å angi bestemte kilden som skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>med flere tabeller, må du angi hvilken tabell som skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde datakilden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen automatisk binde til en datakilde som er representert av en datakilde-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen automatisk binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method unless you dynamically change properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å skrive kode som eksplisitt kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>metoden med mindre du dynamisk endre egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the DataSource property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene er angitt for både egenskapen DataSource og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen ASP.NET kan ikke løse datakilden, og en <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName>forårsakes.</xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> object that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>eller <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> objekt som inneholder en samling av verdiene som brukes til å angi data til denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource object specified is not a supported source of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte DataSource-objektet er ikke en støttet datakilde for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the DataSource property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan ikke løses fordi en verdi er angitt for både egenskapen DataSource og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>for datakilden kontrollere som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen skal bruke til å hente datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSourceID property to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen DataSourceID til å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>for datakilden kontrollere som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen skal bruke til å hente datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source control that is referenced by the DataSourceID property can be any control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontrollen som det refereres til av egenskapen DataSourceID kan være en kontroll som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control that references it or in a parent control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontrollen må finnes i samme naming beholderen som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen som refererer til den eller i en overordnet kontroll av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the DataSourceID property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for egenskapen DataSourceID den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å skrive kode som eksplisitt kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property to specify the source of values to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>til å angi kilden for verdiene som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source must be a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as the <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden må være en samling som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet (slik som den <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>objektet) eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> property, you must write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>-egenskapen, må du skrive kode for å utføre databindingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A> and DataSourceID properties, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene er angitt for både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>og DataSourceID egenskaper ASP.NET kan ikke løse datakilden, og en <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""></xref> property of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""> </xref> egenskapen kontrollens datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved for one of the following reasons: - A value is specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*> and DataSourceID properties.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan ikke løses av én av følgende årsaker:-verdien som er angitt for både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>og DataSourceID egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: - The data source specified by the DataSourceID property cannot be found on the page.
trans-unit.target: Finner ikke-datakilden som er angitt av egenskapen DataSourceID på siden.

trans-unit.source: - The data source specified by the DataSourceID property does not implement <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -Datakilden som er angitt av egenskapen DataSourceID implementerer ikke <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes are applied to this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om oppsett gjelder for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EnableTheming angir om oppsett er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen EnableTheming er `true`, tema mappe for applikasjonen søkes for Skallene for kontrollen skal gjelde for.

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen verktøylinje for bestemt kontrollen i mappen tema, brukes ikke skallene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bruke oppsett; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind*> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> krever databinding, og som er angitt en ugyldig datakildekontroll før du kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen ASP.NET automatisk binding av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, it first calls the EnsureDataBound method to verify that the control has not already been data bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når ASP.NET utfører databinding for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontroll, først kaller metoden EnsureDataBound for å bekrefte at kontrollen ikke allerede er bundet til data og at en gyldig datakilde kontrollere som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnitt er angitt den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnsureDataBound kaller deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that defines how the footer section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som definerer hvordan bunntekstdelen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to create a template that controls how the footer section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å opprette en mal som styrer hvordan bunntekstdelen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen skal vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: Validering serverkontroller leveres også for å vurdere brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [validering Server kontrollen syntaks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that defines how the footer section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som definerer hvordan bunntekstdelen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to create a template that controls how the header section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control is displayed.

trans-unit.source: At this stage in the page life cycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data.
trans-unit.target: I denne fasen i livssyklusen siden serverkontroller i hierarkiet opprettes og initialisert, visningsstatus er gjenopprettet og skjemakontroller at klientsiden data.

trans-unit.source: Any changes in the view state of the server control can be saved during this event.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i visningsstatusen for serverkontrollen kan lagres i løpet av denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Such changes made in the rendering phase are not saved.
trans-unit.target: Slike endringer i gjengivelse fase lagres ikke.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs"></xref> object contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs"> </xref> objektet inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen skal bindes til den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control uses the RequiresDataBinding property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>kontrollen bruker RequiresDataBinding-egenskapen til å bestemme om kontrollen skal kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>metoden skal bindes til den angitte datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>

trans-unit.source: Each time the set accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang set-aksessor kalles på enten de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A>til å endre datakilden etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnInit%2A>har allerede blitt kalt, ASP.NET angir verdien for egenskapen RequiresDataBinding til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the RequiresDataBinding property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen RequiresDataBinding også settes til `true` når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET angir verdien for egenskapen RequiresDataBinding til `false` rett etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen skal bindes til datakilden; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer visningsstatus som har forekommet siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollens gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"> </xref> kontrollen bruker under henting av data fra en kontroll av data.

trans-unit.source: The first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Det første kallet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objekt kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>metode for å opprette den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object used to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objektet brukes til å hente data.

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*> value.
trans-unit.target: Standard er det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden for å kalle for å kunne lese data.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data binding method.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen fører til at modellen binding som skal brukes som metoden for bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> interface that defines how the separator between items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> grensesnitt som definerer hvordan skilletegnet mellom elementer som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: Use the SeparatorTemplate property to create a template that controls how the separator between items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SeparatorTemplate-egenskapen til å opprette en mal som styrer hvordan skilletegnet mellom elementer vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > You can use the SeparatorTemplate property to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Du kan bruke SeparatorTemplate-egenskapen til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: Validering serverkontroller leveres også for å vurdere brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [validering Server kontrollen syntaks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that defines how the separator between items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som definerer hvordan skilletegnet mellom elementer som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the control so they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at sporing av visningsstatus endringene til kontrollen slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objektet.
